Name: Lilac Pansy
Description: A delicate flower with a subtle fragrance, able to grow despite the cold.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 은은한 향기를 지닌 섬세한 꽃. 추위를 이겨내고 아름답게 피어났습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine zarte Blume mit einem dezenten Duft, die trotz der Kälte wachsen kann.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une fleur délicate au parfum subtil, capable de pousser malgré le froid
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Нежный цветок с тонким ароматом, способный расти, несмотря на холод.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种有淡淡香味的娇嫩花朵，尽管天气十分寒冷也能生长
